name: Fireshare
description: Fireshare is a self-hosted media sharing platform that allows you to share your videos, game clips, or other media via unique links with enhanced security and scalability.

notes.text: Default login credentials are admin/admin. Please change these after first login.
Place your video files in /opt/fireshare/videos directory and they will be automatically scanned.
The application serves videos directly, so ensure your upload speed can handle the file sizes you plan to share.
